title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity's fight for survival against giant humanoid creatures.

title: Naruto
description: The story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to bring their mother back to life, leading them on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where nearly every human has a superpower, a powerless boy strives to become a hero.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young boy fights demons to avenge his family and cure his sister, who has been turned into a demon.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew seek the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Goku and his friends as they defend the Earth from powerful enemies.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: One Punch Man
description: A hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch struggles with boredom and finding a real challenge.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, with death in the game meaning death in real life.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter, and struggles with his new identity.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A young pilot is recruited to defend humanity from mysterious beings called Angels using giant bio-mechanical robots.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity's fight for survival against giant humanoid creatures.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy embarks on a quest to find his missing father and become a Hunter.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager acquires the powers of a Soul Reaper to protect the world from evil spirits.

title: Fairy Tail
description: The adventures of Natsu Dragneel and his friends in the magical guild, Fairy Tail.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A group of bounty hunters travel the galaxy in search of dangerous criminals.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends discover time travel, but their actions create unintended consequences.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers swap bodies and try to meet each other in person while uncovering a mystery.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl is trapped in a mysterious, magical world and must find a way to escape.

title: Fruits Basket
description: A girl is taken in by a family cursed to turn into animals of the Chinese Zodiac.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A young psychic tries to live a normal life while struggling to control his powerful abilities.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
description: A group of knights must protect the kingdom from a variety of threats.

title: Black Clover
description: A boy born without magic in a world where magic is everything, aspires to become the Wizard King.

title: Sword Art Online: Alicization
description: Kirito ventures into the world of Underworld, a virtual world that resembles reality.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: A multi-generational story of a family with supernatural abilities battling evil.

title: Gurren Lagann
description: A group of rebels rise up to fight an oppressive force using powerful mechas.

title: Black Lagoon
description: A group of mercenaries carry out dangerous operations in the underworld of Southeast Asia.

title: Re:Zero
description: A young man is transported to another world where he discovers that he can reset time after his death.

title: No Game No Life
description: A brother and sister duo are transported to a world where everything is determined by games.

title: Code Geass
description: A former prince leads a rebellion against an empire using the power of Geass, a mind control ability.

title: Trigun
description: A gunslinger travels through a desert wasteland, hunted by bounty hunters and dealing with his past.

title: Samurai Champloo
description: A trio of unlikely companions travel across Japan during the Edo period.

title: Akira
description: In a dystopian future, a group of teens with psychic abilities battle against a corrupt government.

title: Hellsing
description: A vampire hunter leads an organization dedicated to protecting England from supernatural threats.

title: Elfen Lied
description: A young girl with deadly powers escapes from a lab and enters the human world, where chaos ensues.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: A group of children uncover dark secrets about their orphanage and plan to escape.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A young woman, formerly a soldier, seeks to learn about emotions and human connections after the war.

title: Attack on Titan: The Final Season
description: The conclusion to the epic story of humanity's fight against the Titans.

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
description: A man is transported to another world where he becomes the Shield Hero and must protect the kingdom.

title: Mob Psycho 100 II
description: Mob's journey continues as he learns more about his powers and tries to live a normal life.

title: Great Pretender
description: A con artist finds himself pulled into a series of high-stakes scams around the world.

title: Fate/Zero
description: A battle royale of mages and heroic spirits for the Holy Grail begins in a war that could reshape the world.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A young psychic tries to live a normal life while struggling to control his powerful abilities.

title: Steins;Gate 0
description: A continuation of Steins;Gate, where the characters explore the consequences of their time travel experiments.

title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
description: A girl is bought by a non-human sorcerer to be his apprentice and future bride in a magical world.

title: Black Clover
description: A boy born without magic in a world where magic is everything, aspires to become the Wizard King.

title: The Devil is a Part-Timer!
description: The Demon Lord Satan is transported to modern Tokyo, where he must work part-time at a fast food restaurant.

title: Overlord
description: A player in a virtual reality MMORPG becomes trapped in his favorite game world and must adapt to his new reality.

title: No Game No Life
description: A brother and sister duo are transported to a world where everything is determined by games.
